title: Shopify Lister – Dropshipping (Long-term Position)
job_overview:
Dear,
For our dropshipping business, we aim to reach new heights this year. To achieve this, we are looking for an experienced and highly skilled Shopify Lister with a strong background in Shopify dropshipping to join our new team. 

This is a long-term position.A thorough understanding of the entire process and strong communication skills are essential. To demonstrate that you have read this job posting carefully, please start your application with the word "Shopify" before introducing yourself.

Below, you will find details about the responsibilities and the required experience for this role.

Application Questions:
If you are interested in this position, please answer the following questions in your response:
Do you have experience working with Shopify?
Do you have experience preparing products for advertising?
Do you have experience with Trello, Upgrade to see actual info and Notion?
Have you used Upgrade to see actual info for communication?
Are you available for 6-8 hours per day, 5-6 days a week?

Requirements:
As a Shopify Lister, you must have:
Experience with Shopify (must-have)
Strong communication skills (must-have)
Experience with tools like Adspy, Ecomhunt (preferred)
Previous experience in product research (preferred)
Experience with workflow tools like Trello, Upgrade to see actual info, Notion(must-have)
Experience with communication platforms like Upgrade to see actual info (must-have)

If you do not meet these requirements, please do not apply.

Responsibilities:
Preparing products for launch on our social media platforms (Atleast 5 per day)
Communicating and coordinating with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers involved in the process
Monitoring progress and ensuring there are no delays
Updating Google Sheets with product details and following given instructions



What We Offer:
Clear workflow instructions for every step of the process
Career growth opportunities within the team
Video training / a whole notion document to support your onboarding and development

If you believe you are the right fit for this role and can contribute to our company, please respond to this post.
Best regards,
Michèle
